long_description: In Greek mythology, Atlas was strong enough to shoulder the weight of the world on his back. This ENO hammock suspension system can't do that, but it can support 400 lbs. and makes setup simple. 2 straps weigh only 11 oz., yet they offer 30 combined adjustment points so you can set your hammock up just right, hammock sold separately. Each strap is 9 ft. long, allowing you to wrap it around big trees; straps can also be attached to roof rack, rocks or whatever else you can find. Straps are designed specifically for ENO hammocks but work with most hammocks on the market. 2 straps per package. Each strap in the ENO Atlas hammock suspension system can support 200 lbs., for a combined weight capacity of 400 lbs.
short_description: In Greek mythology, Atlas was strong enough to shoulder the weight of the world on his back. This ENO hammock suspension system can't do that, but it can support 400 lbs. and makes setup simple.
